item.description:
I gather various MeetUp Groups and the "Single Event" for "Rob's Wacky Wednesday", whereby we meet a couple of times per month to attend the new Funny Bone Comedy Club inside Manchester's Buckland Hills Mall. The majority of our attendees are Singles in their 40's-50's, but all (over 21) are welcome to join us!

The weekend headliner (Jimmy Dore) will cost @ $20 but by attending the WEDNESDAY show, the one-time $15 purchase of their promo tee-shirt allows access to this, and just about every WEDNESDAY performance, for FREE forever! Such a deal! We'll gather @ the Funny Bone Bar @ 6:00-6:30 for a chance to get to know each other and have a drink. When the doors open @ 6:30, we'll enter together and optionally order drinks, an appetizer or dinner (separate checks have been pre-approved) before the show starts @ 7:30 (lasting to @ 9). Seating is "first come, first seated", so even if you RSVP "YES", if you show up after 6:30 without notifying me in advance (by 3:00, please), we'll not necessarily be able to hold a seat for you (but we'll try), as otherwise there's no way of knowing if you are going to truly join us, or not.

Between my various affiliations with different MeetUp Groups and the "Single Event", and due to the poor weather forecast, I suspect we'll gather at least 10 people. If more than that RSVP "yes" (ASAP!), I'll try to have them hold more tables/seats for us. I'm sure you'll have a good time and enjoy meeting new friends!

>>> IF you arrive after 6:30, buy your promo tee-shirt at the Box Office, THEN request they give you a FREE ticket. When entering the theater, inform the ticket-taker to seat you with or near "Rob's Wacky Wednesday" group!

- Rob

Rob Pudney
new to West Hartford / work in Bloomfield
rep06450@cox.net
C: (860) 690-9595

DIRECTIONS: The "Funny Bone Comedy Club" is located INSIDE the Buckland Hills Mall, Manchester , CT 06042
Once you arrive at the Buckland Hills Mall: Head toward the Sears / Vinnie T's / Barnes & Noble / JC Penney area. Between Penney's and Barnes & Noble, you'll see a sign for the "Blue Turtle" - enter via that exterior entranceway. The Funny Bone Box Office / Bar / Club is immediately inside, to the left.

HartfordFunnyBone.com

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: TONIGHT: "Funny Bone" Comedy Club - Manchester 6:30
